response: narrative=After missing work with no contact, Clare Lee was reported missing from her home on Craigieknowes Road, Perth. Friend June Powell noted Clare had left her job unexpectedly earlier that week. She was later found safe by a passerby at a nearby location in Perth.

narrative=Clare Lee, an 82-year-old woman, went missing from Ferntower Road, Crieff, prompting concern among those who knew her. A retired IT trainer with a known disability, Clare had been involved in organized protests supporting mental health awareness. On the day of her disappearance, she was scheduled to volunteer at a mental health-related event but never arrived. Clare had also missed a prior commitment at a grocery store where she was seen regularly, with no contact since. Her sister and Lucy Atkinson, a close friend, expressed concerns about her mental state in recent months. Clare was eventually found by police at 51 Grampian Court, Perth, after a search. Her disappearance highlighted the importance of support networks for older adults involved in activism.
